import React, { useContext, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import Mycontext from "../context/Mycontext"; function Signup() { const { SignupFirebase } = useContext(Mycontext); const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [password, setPassword] = useState(""); const [doners, SetDoner] = useState(""); const SignupButton = () => { SignupFirebase(name, email, password, doners); }; return (
